name: Tweety 🕊️ -  Create Stunning tweets !
description:
What is Tweety? 🐤✨ 


Tweety is a Twitter Tweet generator that enabling you to create your own editable tweet-like images as you like.


Features: 👇🏽


🛠 Customise Everything - Username, DP, Source Label, Engagements.


🌻 White and Dark Theme Support 


🌈 More than 25 Gradient Backgrounds


⏳ Coming Soon : Add Images to your Tweet 


Feel free to create, modify and use this project.


You can read my blogs here : ashwxn.codes


வாழ்க தமிழ் ! வளர்க தமிழினம் ! 🟥🟨
